name: clamp
description: Clamps the values of all samples to have a lower limit of min and an upper limit of max.

params.name: field
params.description: Numeric expression. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

params.name: min
params.description: The min value to clamp data into.

params.name: max
params.description: The max value to clamp data into.

examples:
